info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: bo.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 
Connection: close
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Language: en
Date: Sun, 12 Jun 2022 02:06:32 GMT
Expires: 0
Location: https://bo.dossierfacile.fr/login
Pragma: no-cache
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=898A2F34E8949BABDFC2E620BFC857E7; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 ; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Request-Id: c13b08a6-8fce-46b0-9d52-6d9e9bbe9aaa
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: bo.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:

Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 ; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Request-Id: 6f087c96-8d49-46a0-aad7-679bd75418b0
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1

response:

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Referer: https://bo.dossierfacile.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://bo.dossierfacile.fr/login'
